venue.name: Charles River Museum of Industry and Innovation

item.description:
**Update: It looks like we don't have enough participants to put together our own table, so we'll be visitors to the show this year instead. But let's remember to plan to do something great for next year's show!

I'll be going in early tomorrow to see if I can help out a little, and I encourage all of you to stop by and see the show during the day if you can.

 

The New England Model Engineering Society has very kindly invited us to host a table at their show at the Charles River Museum of Engineering on February 18th. We would need to be there at 8am to set up. The show ends at 4.

All members of the Boston Robotics Meetup Group are welcome to submit a piece to show at the table. We are also looking for volunteers to help staff the table during the show.

This show is usually pretty awesome, and the NEMES members are some of the most knowledgeable people I've ever met.

If you are interested in participating, send me a note (or send Kevin a note). I'll also put a note in the discussion section of this meetup so we can have an open coordination discussion.

-Meredith

Meredith@6smith.com
item.name: New England Model Engineering Show
